title: DevOps Engineer
description:
Job Title: DevOps Engineer (AWS)
Location: Texas (Onsite/Hybrid/)
Duration: Full-time

Job Description:

We are seeking a highly skilled DevOps Engineer with strong experience in AWS cloud infrastructure to join our team supporting Swift in Texas. The ideal candidate will have hands-on expertise in designing, implementing, and maintaining CI/CD pipelines, automating infrastructure, and ensuring high availability and scalability across environments.

Responsibilities:

Design, implement, and manage AWS-based cloud infrastructure.

Build and maintain CI/CD pipelines for continuous integration and deployment.

Automate infrastructure provisioning using Terraform, CloudFormation, or similar tools.

Monitor system performance and troubleshoot issues proactively.

Collaborate with development and operations teams to optimize workflows and improve deployment efficiency.

Implement security best practices, monitoring, and logging across cloud and application environments.

Manage configuration and version control using Git, GitHub, or Bitbucket.

Required Skills:

5+ years of experience as a DevOps Engineer.

Strong hands-on experience with AWS services (EC2, S3, Lambda, CloudWatch, ECS, etc.).

Experience with Docker and Kubernetes for container orchestration.

Proficiency in CI/CD tools such as Jenkins, GitLab CI, or AWS CodePipeline.

Expertise in Infrastructure as Code (IaC) tools such as Terraform or CloudFormation.

Strong scripting skills in Python, Bash, or PowerShell.

Knowledge of monitoring and logging tools like Prometheus, Grafana, or ELK Stack.

Excellent communication and problem-solving skills.

Preferred Skills:

AWS Certifications (e.g., AWS Certified DevOps Engineer, AWS Solutions Architect)

Experience with security and compliance automation.

Familiarity with Agile/Scrum methodologies.
